DOC.detailed_description: This study employ randomise 10 week , parallel group , double blind , placebo control design investigate effect daily supplemental orange juice compare equicaloric placebo orange drink cognitive performance 7-10 year old school child . Following screening , participant randomly assign one two condition : ( 1 ) Active group : 100 % orange juice , ( 2 ) Placebo group : control drink ( contain equivalent dose sucrose , glucose , fructose , vitamin C citric acid flavour ) . Both active control group receive drink daily 10 week deliver school-based morning intervention administer researcher . Children also give drink consume weekend school holiday monitor drink intake diary . Participants , parent teacher blind assigned condition . Researchers also blind completion data analysis . At week -1 ( screen ) child test colour blindness ( Ishihara test ) complete Wechsler abbreviate scale intelligence ( WASI ) screening purpose . Respiratory peak flow , height , weight also measure examine relationship cognitive performance physical activity . This study design , include test day morning juice supplementation , intend emulate child 's normal routine far possible . Each carton juice provide mid-morning act supplement usual diet .
